item.title: The 37 Practices of a Bodhisattva's Outline
item.description: Given this text has been translated by enough people 1 2 3, I didn’t want to make yet another translation. However, while studying a Tibetan commentary from འཇིགས་མེད་ཚུལ་ཁྲིམས་དཔལ་བཟང་། (Jigme Tsultrim Palzang), I came accross an interesting outline that I hadn’t seen before. It really helped me to understand the root text better, so I’m sharing the translation I made of this outline. The outline Each number in parentheses indicates the corresponding practice with a total of 37.
